import logo from './holberton-logo.jpg'; import './App.css'; import { getFooterCopy, getFullYear } from './utils'; function App() { return (

School dashboard

Login to access the full dashboard

Copyright {getFullYear()} - {getFooterCopy(Math.random() < 0.5)}

); } export default App;
